name: Bizarre Stuff
description:
Mr. Whiskers has been missing for too long! Embark on a journey into the 80s, enter the downside up and use your telekinetic powers to move platforms at will. Reach portals as fast as you can (Mr. Whiskers is mad at you so you should probably run) and compare your highest scores to the ones of the other portal travellers! 

It's a very bad game I'm sorry lmao, BUT IT CAN BE SPEEDRUNNED

Made for a game jam hosted by RystalDev in 7 days. Follow me on twitter for more bad games: @dragonthedev

Music and sound effects? Eventually...
